Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Authorizes Karol Hughes, a part-time police officer, with the town/village of East Rochester police department to take the civil service examination
Summary: Authorizes Karol Hughes, a part-time police officer, with the town/village of East Rochester police department to take the civil service examination and be eligible for appointment as a full time police officer for the town/village of East Rochester.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Karol Hughes to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer and be placed on the eligible list for employment as a full-time police officer for the town/village of East Rochester
